other_tests.findings: Dysostosis multiplex (whole-body radiography), enlargement of perivascular spaces (brain MRI), and aortic and mitral stenosis (echocardiography).

other_tests.procedure_name: Skin prick tests (SPT) and intradermal tests

other_tests.findings: Pathogenic hemizygous IDS variant c.1295G > A (p.Cys432Tyr), confirming the diagnosis of MPS II.
